long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of endlessly scrolling through YouTube Shorts? Stop Scrolling is here to help! This simple and effective extension puts a limit to the infinite scroll on YouTube Shorts, helping you focus on what matters most.

With a user-friendly interface, you can easily enable or disable the scroll block at any time. Keep track of how many times the scrolling has been blocked with the built-in counter. Perfect for those who want more control over their YouTube viewing experience.
